creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: cream colored carton with tan stripes, wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid, wrapped in tissue; paper around scroll under tie; fabric is light green; image of landscape with tall skinny mountains and trees; small houses and a river with two figures in a boat
inscription:
青山衛四壁　中有讀書寮　竹樹含翠微　梅花照寂寥　清泉汲無盡　明月來不招　獨坐耽吟詠　因知道味饒
{?}
(Green mountains encircle me—four walls,
Enclosing a hut for reading books.
Bamboo trees imbued with blue-green colors,
Plum blossoms glimmering through the silence.
A pure stream provides limitless water,
The brilliant moon comes without being called:
Here alone I sit, enjoying chanting poetry,
And realizing the richness of the flavor of Tao.)
[Jonathan Chaves]
title: Landscape with Plum
